scripts.pwtests-comment: The version of the docker playwright image used here must exactly match the versions of @playwright/test in devDependencies and the Github Actions configuration (in playwright.yml).  The version of playwright used in devDependencies should not include the ^ prefix, so it doesn't auto-upgrade and get out of sync. The version of playwright used in playwright.yml should be the same as the version of playwright used in devDependencies.
scripts.pwtests: docker run --rm --network host --volume $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.35.1-jammy /bin/bash -c "npm ci && npx playwright test"
scripts.pwtests-update: docker run --rm --network host --volume $(pwd):/work/ -w /work/ -it mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.35.1-jammy /bin/bash -c "npm ci && npx playwright test --update-snapshots"
